**The Golden Lotus Orthodox Daoist Lineage: *Xianyuan Portrait Transmission***
**Scripture Title:** *The Golden Lotus Orthodox Daoist Lineage: Xianyuan Portrait Transmission*
**One scroll.**
**Compiled by:** Liu Zhixuan et al. in the Yuan dynasty.
**Source of the base text:** *Zhengtong Daozang*, *Dongzhen* section, *Pǔlù* (Lineage Records) category.

---

**Preface to the *Golden Lotus Orthodox Daoist Lineage: Xianyuan Portrait Transmission***
Li Quanzheng carried with him the *Quanzhen Orthodox Daoist Lineage: Xianyuan Portrait Transmission* compiled by Liu Tiansu and Xie Xichan. Upon reading it, I was deeply moved and, in reverence, composed this ode:

*The Dao’s wind ascends—*
*Green Ox crosses westward,*
*Five-thousand words of subtle speech,*
*The boundless Dao’s Ancestor.*

*Passed down through generations,*
*To Zhong and Lu’s age.*
*One coin cast, two sages met—*
*Seven lotuses, rare and bright,*
*Constellation’s dew, sweet and pure.*

*Honored at Snow Mountain,*
*Transformations spread through the Central Realm.*
*Though ages pass, the words endure,*
*The Dao knows no past nor future.*

*Portraits transmitted—*
*As if heard, as if seen.*
*Yellow Crane soars in mist,*
*White clouds drift where?*
*A scroll of pure script,*
*A wisp of incense smoke.*

*Heaven and earth between,*
*Peach blossoms, flowing waters.*

*Written in spring, the year Dingmao of Taiding,*
*By the Heavenly Master’s successor, Taixuanzi,*
*At the Hall of Mysterious Virtue.*

*The Dao’s subtlety—*
*Some things transcend scripture,*
*Some must be conveyed through scripture.*
*Thus this *Xianyuan Portrait Transmission* was composed.*

*Only the Quanzhen Daoists,*
*From Xuanyuan downward,*
*Five Patriarchs, Seven Immortals,*
*Virtue profound, power vast,*
*Transformations reaching the Nine Realms.*

*Master Qiu Changchun’s snow-capped mountain,*
*The Dao’s wind fully revealed—*
*This needed no scripture to transmit.*
*Yet their auspicious deeds*
*Were not easily traced.*
*I often wished to compile a complete record.*

*One day, I spoke this intent to Master Xie Xichan,*
*Who rejoiced and agreed.*
*Together, we gathered records,*
*Examined inscriptions and steles,*
*And over years of research,*
*At last achieved full clarity.*

*Thus, we placed the portraits first,*
*Appended the transmissions,*
*And named it the *Quanzhen Orthodox Daoist Lineage: Xianyuan Portrait Transmission*.*

*Let those of like mind who read it*
*Seek what can be transmitted*
*And grasp what cannot—*
*Then this work shall not be without merit.*
*Should there remain omissions,*
*I hope others will instruct me further.*

*Written on the Yang Zhi Day of the year Bingyin, Taiding,*
*By the Daoist Liu Zhixuan of Qingxi, Mount Lu.*

**The Golden Lotus Orthodox Daoist Lineage: Xianyuan Portrait Transmission**

**Edict of Yuan Taizu Chenggis Khan Summoning Master Qiu the Immortal**

*The Emperor said:*
*"Heaven favors the Central Plains,*
*And I, dwelling in the Northern Wilderness,*
*Have extinguished all desires,*
*Returning to simplicity,*
*Rejecting excess, embracing frugality.*
*Each meal and garment*
*Shared with oxherds and horsemen,*
*My people treated as my own children,*
*Scholars as my brothers.*
*I seek harmony,*
*Nurture virtue,*
*And lead the masses,*
*Never placing myself before them,*
*Nor lagging behind in battle.*

*In seven years, great deeds were accomplished,*
*The Four Quarters united under one rule.*
*This was not my virtue alone,*
*But the will of Heaven,*
*For the age’s governance was unstable.*
*Thus, I received Heaven’s mandate,*
*Ascended the throne,*
*Subdued the Southern Song,*
*Pacified the Khitans,*
*And all the Eastern Xia and Western barbarians bowed as vassals.*
*Never in a thousand generations of the Xiongnu state*
*Has this been seen.*

*Yet the burden of rule is heavy,*
*And though peace prevails,*
*I fear neglect.*
*Just as one carves an oar to cross the river,*
*Or selects ministers to govern the land,*
*Since my ascension,*
*I have diligently attended to affairs,*
*Yet the Three Excellencies remain unfilled.*

*I inquired about Master Qiu,*
*Whose body embodies the Dao,*
*Whose footsteps follow the Rule,*
*Whose knowledge is vast and profound,*
*Whose wisdom penetrates the depths of things,*
*Whose virtue is boundless,*
*Whose demeanor is that of an ancient sage,*
*Whose conduct is that of a true adept.*
*For years, he has dwelled in seclusion,*
*Hiding his form in the mountains,*
*Reviving the Ancestors’ teachings,*
*And gathering Daoists of the Way.*
*His collection of Daoist scriptures*
*Is beyond count.*

*Though war has ended,*
*I know he still hides in his old mountain retreat.*
*My heart reveres him without end.*
*Have I not heard of*
*The same carriage on the Wei River,*
*The three visits to the thatched hut?*
*Yet mountains and rivers lie between us,*
*And I cannot personally welcome him.*

*I have only withdrawn from court,*
*Purified my body and mind,*
*And sent my attendant Liu Zhonglu*
*With a modest carriage and light escort,*
*Not sparing the thousand-mile journey,*
*To humbly invite Master Qiu*
*To descend from his lofty steps.*
*Whether he speaks of*
*The people’s welfare*
*Or my own preservation,*
*I will attend him personally,*
*And even a single word from his coughing lips*
*Would suffice.*

*Now, I merely express my earnest hope*
*In this edict,*
*That Master Qiu may*
*Reveal the essentials of the Great Dao,*
*And fulfill even the smallest wishes of all beings.*

*Issued on the first day of the fifth month.*

**Praise and Enfeoffment by Yuan Shizu (Kublai Khan)**

*The Emperor said:*
*"The Dao, when illuminated,*
*Leads to effortless transformation.*
*The Absolute Truth, when nurtured,*
*Accomplishes what cannot be governed.*

*I, inheriting the foundations of my ancestors,*
*Have long admired the Mysterious Wind.*
*From the Eastern Peak’s teachings*
*To Master Zhongyang’s revelations,*
*The True and Pure have never faded,*
*And each generation has carried it forward.*
*Where there is feeling, communication follows,*
*And no distance is too great to reach.*

*Though past emperors bestowed honors,*
*In my heart, I still feel they were insufficient.*
*Thus, I command the scholars*
*To further elevate their titles.*
*Since the Eastern Peak is already called the Imperial Sovereign,*
*Let him be granted the title of ‘Minor Yang of the Purple Bureau.’*
*The True Lords of Zhengyang, Chunyang, Haichan, and Zhongyang*
*Shall be ennobled as ‘True Princes.’*
*The seven True Persons of Danyang and below*
*Shall all be titled ‘True Immortals,’*
*Recorded in the registers,*
*And passed down through the ages.*

*Ah!*
*Zhang Daoling of the Han*
*And Yi Fasuan of the Tang*
*Both received the title of ‘Heavenly Master,’*
*Becoming eternal honors for the Dao.*
*In their time, no dissent was heard,*
*And later, it became a fixed institution.*
*This is what I aspire to—*
*Perhaps I may come close."*

The Eastern Peak Dao Master may be ennobled as **Eastern Peak Purple Bureau Minor Yang Emperor**.

The **Zhongli True Person of Zhengyang** may be ennobled as **Zhengyang Enlightening Transmission of the Way True Lord**.

The **Pure-Hearted Lü True Person** may be ennobled as **Pure Yang Rectifying and Warning the Transformation True Lord**.

The **Haichan Liu True Person** may be ennobled as **Haichan Illuminating Enlightenment and Expounding the Way True Lord**.

The **Zhongyang Wang True Person** may be ennobled as **Zhongyang Complete Perfection and Enlightening the Transformation True Lord**.

The **Danyang Master Ma Dan** may be ennobled as **Danyang Embracing Unity and Non-Action True Person**.

The **Changzhen Master Tan Chuduan** may be ennobled as **Changzhen Cloud-and-Water Nurturing Virtue True Person**.

The **Changsheng Master Liu Chuxuan** may be ennobled as **Changsheng Aiding Transformation and Illuminating Virtue True Person**.

The **Changchun Master Qiu Chuji** may be ennobled as **Changchun Performing the Way and Teaching the Dao True Lord**.

The **Yuyang Master Wang Chuyi** may be ennobled as **Yuyang Manifesting the Mysterious and Broadly Guiding True Person**.

The **Guangning Master Hao Datong** may be ennobled as **Guangning Communing with the Mysterious and Ancient True Person**.

The **Qingjing Scattered Person Sun Bu’er** may be ennobled as **Qingjing Profoundly Upright and Harmonizing Virtue True Person**.

It is proper that **Zhang Zhijie, the Sincere and Illuminating True Person Who Upholds the Dao**, shall execute this decree.

This is hereby approved.

**至元六年正月日**
By decree of the **Wu Zong Emperor**, the **Heavenly Mandate of the Emperor of Divine Favor**:

The **Sanxuan Teaching** was ordained by Heaven, now encompassing all spirits, its five-hundred-year lineage flourishing in the proper order of the age. In days of old, the **East华 Emperor** of the **Taichen Palace** sustained an unbroken lineage unknown in its beginning and end, with **qi** vast and boundless, its mysteries beyond measure. Detached from form and trace, yet naturally so, it brings fortune and auspice without utterance, transmitted to the **August Sovereign**, this is the **Quanzhen Way**.

To uphold the One, abide in harmony—without seeking, yet without reliance—ascending the **Red Lacquer and Azure Rainbow**, circling the **Tortoise Diagram and Unicorn Talisman**, its law enduring through cataclysm, its successors emerging as **Highly True Ones**. The ancient **Guest Teachers** now manifest as the **Bright and Pure**, compassionate and courageous, supremely filial and chaste, their resolve unshaken before winter’s test. Their words are fulfilled; in matters of assembly, their foresight extends to the warmth already bestowed upon their persons, their sincerity in repaying roots ever deeper. Thus, gracious edicts descend, titles bestowed in proper order.

Verily, when **Divine and Human** harmonize, the **Way of Kings** is balanced—let this be proclaimed far and wide. When **Teaching and Transformation** prevail, governance is established—let this be preserved eternally.

It is decreed to ennoble the **East华 Emperor of the Purple Bureaucracy, Auxiliary of the Primordial, Founder of the Pole**—let the responsible authorities execute this.

**至大三年二月日**
By decree of the **Heavenly Mandate of the Emperor of Divine Favor**:

It is said that the **August Sovereign** expounded the **Quanzhen Teaching**, aligning with the eternal principles of Heaven and Earth, following the great order of Yin and Yang. It began with the **East华 Transformation**, concluding with the **Kaiyuan Bestowal of Green Decrees**, from Han to Tang, producing **Aged Ones of the Age** at intervals. With Jin succeeding Song, during the **Xichao Dynasty**, the **Dao lineage** shone forth, its myriad mysteries unfolded, its foundation in the **Nameless Primordial**. Some attained **meaning beyond form**, nurturing themselves in the **Spiritual Pivot**; others **rode dragons and stars**, soaring in the **Purple Extremity**. Unheard, unseen—though consorting with the **Creator**, they came and went in quietude, yet their responses aligned with the times.

Thus, their deeds were recorded for posterity, their virtues praised as **Jade Leaves** of **Original Merit**. Let their ranks be properly elevated, that the **doctrinal wind** may endure forever.

Except for the **First Ancestor, East华 Emperor**, whose honors shall be separately deliberated, the rest shall be executed uniformly by the responsible authorities.

The **Zhongli True Lord of Zhengyang Enlightenment and Dao Transmission** may be ennobled as the **Zhengyang Emperor of Enlightenment, Dao Transmission, and Instruction**.

The **Lü True Lord of Chunyang Correcting the Dao and Warning the World** may be ennobled as the **Chunyang Emperor of Correcting the Dao, Warning the World, and Auspicious Aid**.

The **Liu True Lord of Haitan Enlightenment, Dao Expansion, and Pure Aid** may be ennobled as the **Haitan Emperor of Enlightenment, Dao Expansion, and Supreme Aid**.

The **Wang True Lord of Chongyang Quanzhen Transformation** may be ennobled as the **Chongyang Emperor of Quanzhen Transformation and Auxiliary of the Pole**.

This is entrusted to the **Great Dao Master of the Dao Transmission, the Rectifying and Pure True Person of Concentrated Harmony, Miao Dao-yi**, to receive and execute. Approved thus.

**至大三年二月日**
By decree of the **Heavenly Mandate of the Emperor of Divine Favor**:

When Heaven first formed the **Grass Muddle**, only the **Noble Ones** wove its threads. In an age of **Sagely Prosperity**, the **Aged Ones** upheld and guarded it. In days of old, when our **August Ancestor** established the foundation in the **Northern Lands**, a **True Immortal** manifested in the **Eastern Quarter**, acting without obstruction, knowing all under Heaven, his learning profound, exhausting all scriptures. His urgent priority was to rescue the people from the abyss; his first concern was to clear the thorns of the Dao. Though his self-discipline was strict, his benefit to all was vast.

When the **Silken Edicts** descended in succession, the **Cloud-Capped Ones** followed, leading eighteen **Exemplary and Common** souls. Their words encompassed more than one matter of **State and Lineage**; their hearts in silent accord, like **Huangdi’s** teacher **Guangcheng**, their speech concise yet profound, like **Han Wen’s** riverbank meeting. Having achieved success for the **Chinese**, they were entrusted with **Longchun Teaching**. Those who followed in their likeness attained the **True**, thus it is said: *"May the sun’s brilliance endure, prolonging the **Hong** lineage’s fortune, as the **Present Rectifiers**."* To revive the **Dao Gate** anew—all are one in this.

Now, in this time, **abundant rewards** are bestowed; past and present are not two principles.

It is fitting to advance their titles in posthumous honor, that their **rules** may endure eternally.

The **Longchun True Lord of Dao Performance and Teaching, Qiu Chuji**, may be ennobled as the **Longchun True Lord of Complete Virtue, Divine Transformation, Illuminating Response**—let the responsible authorities execute this.

**至大三年二月日**
By decree of the **Heavenly Mandate of the Emperor of Divine Favor**:

Assisting in **One Virtue**, Heaven reveals its thoughts. Seven founders—**the Dao’s practice**—like the **Pivot Star** governing the **Primordial Axis**, like the **Gnomon and Level** aligning with **Divine Instruments**. Whose sons? **Icons of the Emperor’s Forebears**, exhausting the mysteries of **Laozi and Guan Yin**, yet without action, they **self-so transformed**, questioning **Donglai and Xishan**.

Some withdrew into the **dustly world**; others dwelled in **humble walls**. When the **Royal Yuan Dynasty’s** fortunes arose, they personally received the **August Ancestor’s** favor. Their **exalted strategies** unfolded as **salvation for the age**; their **Dao mechanisms** transcended, consorting with Heaven. None failed to exhaust the **depths of teacher and friend**; all had already ascended to the **Dawn of the Celestial Morning**, expounding the **ancient rules** anew, multiplying as **guests in the imperial halls**. Their **profound talents and learning** were inherited—now, the **Divine Chess** is presented. Let their **visible ranks** be elevated to enrich the **True Wind**.

Except for the **Longchun Teaching Master Qiu**, whose honors shall be separately proclaimed, the rest shall be executed uniformly by the responsible authorities.

The **True Person of Danyang Embracing the One and Non-Action, Ma Dan** may be ennobled as the **Dan Emperor of Embracing the One, Non-Action, and Universal Transformation**.

The **True Person of Changsheng Cloud-Water Nurturing Virtue, Tan Chuzhuan** may be ennobled as the **Changsheng True Lord of Concentrated Spirit, Mysterious Tranquility, and Nurturing Virtue**.

The **True Person of Changsheng Auxiliary Transformation and Illuminating Virtue, Liu Chuxuan** may be ennobled as the **Changsheng True Lord of Auxiliary Transformation, Foundational Mystery, and Illuminating Virtue**.

The **True Person of Yuyang Manifesting the Mysterious and Broadly Guiding, Wang Chuyi** may be ennobled as the **Yuyang True Lord of Manifesting the Mysterious, Broad Compassion, and Universal Guidance**.

The **True Person of Guangning Communing with the Dao of the Primordial Age, He Datong**, may be ennobled as the **Guangning True Lord of Communing with the Dao, Marvelous Extremes, and the Primordial Age**.

The **True Person of Pure Quiet, Profound Integrity, and Harmonizing Virtue, Sun Bu’er**, may be ennobled as the **True Lord of Pure Quiet, Profound Integrity, Mysterious Emptiness, and Harmonizing Transformation**.

The above is entrusted to the **Grand Master of the Dao Gate, Master of Teaching, Concentrated Harmony, Upholding Rectitude, and Illuminating Purity, Miao Dao’yī**, to execute accordingly. Issued on the second month, Zhida era, the third year.

**Imperial Edict of the Heavenly Mandate Emperor:**

The ancients have said: To exhaust loyalty to one’s sovereign, to fulfill filial piety toward one’s parents, to return sincerity to Heaven, to bestow benevolence upon the people—those who possess talent to aid governance and learning to enrich others may be ranked among the Celestial Worthies, and their Dao may flourish in the present age.

The **True Person of Pure Harmony, Marvelous Dao, and Broad Transformation, Yin Zhiping**, bears a divine spirit and boundless breadth, with a noble and austere bearing. Though clad in coarse robes, he is not emaciated like the recluses of mountain and marsh; though adorned in courtly attire, he is not ostentatious like the ministers of the hall. He responds to all things with effortless spontaneity, swift as if following the loom’s threads yet enduring as the eternal. Entering the Hall of Long Life, he still teaches as the Master of Long Life; embodying the True Form of Supreme Extremes, he perfectly aligns with it. He demonstrates the true principles to the four quarters, receiving the rites and favor of the three courts.

Now, having a worthy successor, he has restored the sacred steps of the Dao. Let extraordinary honors be bestowed upon him to elevate his title.

Ah! The weak waters of Penglai return without need of boats and carriages, and auspicious clouds linger like the flying banner of the Yellow Emperor. Let him be ennobled as the **Grand True Person of Pure Harmony, Marvelous Use, Broad Transformation, and Venerable Teaching**, and the responsible officials shall carry it out. Issued on the second month, Zhida era, the third year.

**Imperial Edict of the Heavenly Mandate Emperor:**

The orthodox lineage of Dao and Virtue has been passed down through worthy descendants, and the most profound learning has emerged from the radiant court.

The **True Person of Eternal Constant, Supreme Virtue, and Propagating Teaching, Li Zhichang**, shines with refined words and surpasses others in conduct. His writings surpass the elegance of *Zhuangzi*’s parables, and his divine responses transcend the limits of sight and hearing. Uncarved like the pure jade, his actions do not suppress the extraordinary; his sincerity is unadulterated, his essence boundless. How can he be named? How can he be surpassed?

Let his eminent realm be proclaimed, and let special honors be conferred upon him, to illuminate the flourishing lineage of the Complete Perfection and to comfort the repeated petitions of the worthy teacher.

Ah! His fame resounds like the treasures of the *Baojian*, and he succeeds the *Taichen* Lord across countless eons. His brilliance shines like the spring flowers, and he inherits the *Chengming* Sage through two generations.

Let him be ennobled as the **Grand True Person of Eternal Constant, Marvelous Response, Manifested Literature, and Comprehensive Salvation**, and the responsible officials shall carry it out. Issued on the second month, Zhida era, the third year.

**Imperial Edict of the Heavenly Mandate Emperor:**

The Way is called the "Non-Action," and nothing is more precious than a just name.

Indeed, the virtuous model of Qingyi is admired by all, yet his refined and dignified bearing is not merely for show. His deeds are already evident in his lifetime, and the rites should now be bestowed with imperial favor.

The **True Person of Communing with the Dao, Propagating Teaching, and Piercing the Clouds, Song Defang**, early awakened to the mysterious principles and exhaustively explored the esoteric arts. He purified his heart, untainted by petty concerns, and embraced the vast transformation without boasting of minor virtues. His virtue is complete, yet his talent remains unshowy; his capacity is boundless, yet he obstructs nothing. Leading the Celestial Worthies and governing the True Lords, all praise him as a treasure at the feast. Riding the swift winds, he traverses Kunlun; his movements align with the cosmic cycles. Granting his request, let his essence be honored.

Ah! His merits exceed the years, and he follows the mighty strides of *Gengsang*. His spirit is concentrated, and nothing is impaired; he embodies the abundant harvests of *Gushan*.

Let him be ennobled as the **Grand True Person of the Mysterious Capital, Supreme Dao, Venerable Literature, and Illuminating Transformation**, and the responsible officials shall carry it out.

In the third year of the Zhi Da era, the second month, the Emperor, by Heaven’s favor and mandate, issued an imperial edict:

*"From the sage reigns of Tang and Yu, there emerged the grand patterns for enduring governance. The worthy ministers of Ji and Yi were indeed chosen to ascend to the celestial realm, for Heaven does not create talent in vain, nor does the Dao’s transmission rest upon the unworthy. In days past, the Venerable Long Spring [Zhuangzi] encountered the Sage Emperor, and the divine scrolls were bestowed upon the Eastern lands, while the swift chariot circled in the Western campaign. Whether before or behind, left or right, their resolve was steadfast—soaring above frost and ice to wander the Celestial Purity, their writings illuminated, their jade and zither upright, their rectitude unshaken. Their profound works stood firm, their teachings grew ever brighter, and thus we honor the green-scripted decrees and uphold the ancient red-barrier traditions.

Ah! The auspicious dragon and phoenix ascend in their merit, and the crimson realm’s mysteries cluster in the clouds—favors unmatched, their deeds inscribed in the sacred records. Let their exalted titles be bestowed and their glory endure.

Let the officials deliberate on the promotions of the following: Yin Qinghe, Song Pi’yun, and Li Zhenchang, with the rest following precedent. Zhao Daojian shall be ennobled as the **True Person of Loyal Integrity, the Radiant Dao-Master of the Orthodox Teaching**. Song Da’an shall be ennobled as the **True Person of Primordial Clarity, Universal Illumination, and Exalted Virtue**. Xia Zhicheng shall be ennobled as the **True Person of Non-Action, Embracing the Dao, and Substantial Virtue**. Wang Zhiming shall be ennobled as the **True Person of Auspicious Spirit, Dao’s Resource, and Preserved Light**. Sun Zhijian shall be ennobled as the **True Person of Illuminated Sincerity, Embodied Mystery, and Void Tranquility**. Yu Zhike shall be ennobled as the **True Person of Sincere Purity, Restored Simplicity, and Boundless Void**. Zhang Zhisu shall be ennobled as the **True Person of Responding to Verdant Teaching, Exalted Dao, and Illuminating Transformation**. Zheng Zhixiu shall be ennobled as the **True Person of Penetrating Subtlety, Restored Stillness, and Boundless Response**. Ju Zhiyuan shall be ennobled as the **True Person of Preserving Truth, Substantial Simplicity, and Tranquil Response**. Meng Zhishen shall be ennobled as the **True Person of Profound Mystery, Broad Virtue, and Boundless Application**. Zhang Zhiyuan shall be ennobled as the **True Person of Awakened Truth, Concentrated Transformation, and Pure Substance**. Jing Zhiyuan shall be ennobled as the **True Person of Embodied Primordial, Cherished Virtue, and Boundless Awakening**. He Zhijing shall be ennobled as the **True Person of Void Clarity, Profound Stillness, and Guarding the One**. Yang Zhijing shall be ennobled as the **True Person of Piercing Void, Attaining the One, and Mysterious Passage**. Pan Dechong shall be ennobled as the **True Person of Piercing Mystery, Marvelous Dao, and Boundless Harmony**.

This decree is entrusted to the Great Dao-Master of the Perfected Way, the Rectifying and Illuminating True Person of Concentrated Harmony, Master Miao Dao-yi, to execute accordingly. Issued on the second month, third year of Zhi Da.*

In days of old, the Ancestral Master, the Venerable Long Spring Qiu True Lord, embraced the Dao and cherished virtue, retreating deeply into Donglai. The Founding Emperor, upon hearing of his renown, summoned him from afar to the snowy mountains, bestowing upon him honors most exalted, and thus the Dao’s winds flourished anew. When the World-Conquering Emperor unified the realm, he further revered him, and the Five Ancestors and Seven Worthies were all granted illustrious titles. The Martial Emperor further ennobled him as the **Celestial Sovereign and True Lord**, and the Eighteen Great Masters were universally bestowed the rank of True Person—truly a matchless event in history. Though the peaks of Kongtong resounded with Daoist inquiries and the Yellow River’s banks echoed with sutra debates, who could surpass such splendor in antiquity?

Your servant, Zhi Xuan, born in this prosperous age and unworthy of scholarly robes, recently served as disciple to the Great Dao-Master of Opening the Mysteries, True Person Sun, at the Great Long Spring Palace in the capital. There, I beheld the decrees of the Sage Emperors and, with reverence, transcribed them to share with all under Heaven, that all may witness the Emperor’s profound reverence for the Dao.

On the fifteenth day of the first month, Tai Ding era, the Purple-Gated High Sage of Clarified Void, Profound Tranquility, and Piercing Illumination, your servant Liu Zhi Xuan, prostrates and kneels in homage at the end of this scroll.
